name: Lost place (rockinmunky)
description:
You are in a lost place. You don't know where you are and why you are even there. The only thing you know is to survive. To get out of that city. To outlast.

This is a short 3D Horror experience with several jumpscares!

In-Game Controls:

GamepadKeyboardMove ForwardsStick forwardsW
Move BackwardsStick backwardsSRotate Player Right StickA / DFlashlight On / OffRight Stick buttonERunLeft Stick buttonLeft ShiftAimL2Right MouseShootR2Left MouseStashR1TabUse Item / Move ThingsWest buttonFBackEast buttonCMenuStart buttonEscapeUse / Move in stash etcSouth buttonSpaceTurn AroundNorth buttonQ

Please take care: There are huge jumpscares and I wouldnt recommend the game to children.

The game was made for the "Themed Horror Game Jam #9 - Haloween Edition" and is not in a final state. There will be upcoming updates to make the experience more frightening. Please tell me about Bugs / Glitches etc. so that I can fix them.

Have fun with the game!
